      • clickedExitBtn

        void clickedExitBtn​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
             throws java.io.IOException
        clickedExitBtn - method called when clicked on exit button, closes connection and exits app
        Parameters:
        event - - mouse click
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - throws if failed to close connection between client and server

      • clickedLoginBtn

        void clickedLoginBtn​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        clickedLoginBtn - method called when clicked on login button, opens appropriate window for each user type identify user by sending username and password to server and receive user data from it
        Parameters:
        event - - mouse click
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - sqlexeption if error occurred while reading data send from server, exception if error occurred while creating new window specific user type

      • newWindow

        private void newWindow​(java.lang.String windowName)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        newWindow - creates new window and hides login window
        Parameters:
        windowName - - name of fxml file to open in clientFXML folder
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - if error while creating new window
